full_text:
Received: 1/25/08 8:39AM; 5616404420 --> STATE ATTY OFC; Page 1
01/23/2008 15:06 5616404420

Aileen Josephs, P.A.
Attorney at Law
301 Clematis Street
Suite 300
West Palm Beach, Florida 33401
(561) 802-4119
Fax (561) 640-4420
E-Mail: josephsA@aol.com
http://www.ImmigrationUS.com
http://www.MuniMundo.net

Aileen Josephs
Member of District of Columbia
and Florida Bars

January 25, 2008

TO: Ms. Sanchez, Esq.
RE: Mr. Epstein
From Aileen Josephs, Esq.

Ms. Sanchez:

Women in our County have been watching this case with great concern. I strongly suggest that you do not attack the victim(s). If you feel your client is innocent, you can file a libel suit- of course, the truth is an absolute defense to libel, and please keep in mind that not knowing the age of a child is no defense to statutory rape or any sexual crime committed against a child.

Sincerely,

Aileen Josephs
Aileen Josephs, Esq.

Cc: Ms. Lana Belohavek- State Attorney's Office
Ms. La Tosha Lowe- request to place this letter in State's file
Chief of Police- Palm Beach

07/26/17 Page 88 of 102 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031396

additional_notes: The document is a letter from Aileen Josephs, Esq. to Ms. Sanchez, Esq. regarding Mr. Epstein. The letter is dated January 25, 2008, and is related to a case involving sexual crimes against a child. The document is part of a public records request (No.: 17-295) and has been stamped with a received date and time.
